articles.author: Joel Khalili
articles.title: What’s Behind the Bitcoin Price Surge? Vibes, Mostly
articles.description: The price of bitcoin has climbed to a new all-time high. But assigning the cryptocurrency a value is anything but trivial.
articles.content: The latest surge in the price of bitcoin is increasing the clamor around it, says Dal Bianco, drawing in yet more speculators and creating a self-reinforcing cycle. Likewise, when collective confiden… [+2967 chars]

articles.author: Artem Golub and Thomas Germain
articles.title: Why Bitcoin Won’t Reach $1,000,000
articles.description: Coindesk’s Andy Baehr says Bitcoin is just a normal, bread and butter investment now.
articles.content: Coindesks Andy Baehr says Bitcoin is just a normal, bread and butter investment now.
